string.name: arts
string.br: D20 Building, opposite to CIMB Bank
Facilities include Galeri Adiwarna which is an art exhibition

string.name: biology
string.br: Five main research laboratories, namely, Plant Pathology Laboratory, Phytochemistry Laboratory, Biotechnology and Molecular Biology Laboratory, Microbiology Laboratory, and Fish Biology Laboratory.
Houses teaching laboratories for Plant Pathology, Microbiology and Biotechnology. Academic staff offices are located within the two buildings.
Supported by other facilities such as Electron Microscope Unit, Herbarium, Plant House and Fish House.

string.name: chemical
string.br: Dean email: r_adnan@usm.my (Professor Dr. Rohana Binti Adnan)
The school occupies a four storey building which houses research and teaching facilities. An annex was recently added due to the expansion of analytical and industrial chemistry programs.

string.name: communication
string.br: Facilities: Film and Broadcast, Persuasive Communication, Journalism

string.name: Computer
string.br: Facilities include a lecture hall, 4 computer laboratories, 2 tutorial rooms with projector, 1 student self-serve cafe with 3 vending machines, 1 student lounge, 2 elevators and 1 viva room.
USM is ranked within the top 100 universities in the world for Computer Science and Information Systems (QS World University Rankings, 2017).

string.name: DistanceEdu
string.br: Dean: Associate Professor Dr. Zoraini Wati M Abas
Oldest distance education program at university level in Malaysia

string.name: EduScience
string.br: Dean: Professor Dr. Hairul Nizam Ismail
Facilities for School of Educational Sciences are as follows:

Meeting Room, Digest Room, Coference Room, Special Education Room, Micro Education Rooms, Viva Room, Biology Lab, Computer Lab, Chemistry Lab, Mathematics Lab, Physics Lab, Student Lounge, Poligraph Room, Counseling Room, Multi-Purpose Room, Research Rooms, Source Room, Sensory Room, SMART LAB, Auditorium.

string.name: HBP
string.br: Dean: Assoc. Prof. Ir. Dr Abdul Naser Abdul Ghani
The nation’s oldest built environment school.
7 undergraduate programs: architecture, interior design, building surveying, building technology, construction management, urban and regional planning, and quantity surveying.
Facilities provided are Structural Laboratory, Concrete and Cement Lab and Other Equipments

string.name: Humanities
string.br: One of the oldest humanities faculties in Malaysia.
Covers a wide spectrum of disciplines that include philosophy, religion, language, literature, translation, history, geography, and civilisation.

Facilities are Resource Room, Language Rooms, Audiovisual Lab, Interpretation Lab, GIS Lab, Archieve and Documentation Room, Hydrology Lab, Computer Lab , Physical Geography Lab, Cartography Lab, Seminar/Viva Room, Meeting Rooms, Undergraduate Student Lounge, Postgraduate Karel Room

string.name: IndusTech
string.br: The Food Tech laboratories: Food Processing Lab, Food Instrumental Analysis Lab, Food Chemical Analysis Lab
The BPC Tech laboratories: Furniture Workshop, Pulp and Paper Testing Lab, Coatings Lab, Thermal Testing Lab
The Env Tech laboratories: Energy Testing Unit, Water moving in circular motion covariance flux and meteorological station that monitors environmental parameters.
The Bioprocess Tech facilities: Cell Culture Lab, Fermentation Technology Lab, Microalgae Lab

string.name: Language
string.br: Dean: Prof. Dr. Salasiah Che Lah
Has a Terminology Unit that is responsible for providing assistance to Dewan Bahasa dan Pustaka (DBP) in terminology building in Bahasa Malaysia.
Services include translation, editing, interpreting, language consultancy and short-term and longterm language courses.
Facilities are Resource Room, Language Laboratory and Computer Assisted Language

string.name: management
string.br: Dean: Professor Dr. Noor Hazlina Ahmad
Faculties available are Accounting, Business Analytics, Finance and Islamic Finance, International Business, Marketing, Operation Management, Stratergy and Organisational Management
Facilities provided are Auditorium, Banquet Room, Conference Room, Computer Room, Foyer, Front Desk, PHD Room, Student Lounge, Meeting Room, SOM Building, Training Room, Viva Room

string.name: Mathematics
string.br: Programs available are Mathematics, Mathematics Modelling, Applied Statistics, Operations Research and Mathematics And Economy

string.name: Pharmacy
string.br: Dean: Prof. Dr. Habibah Binti A Wahab
Services provided are Pharmacology, Physiology, Pharmaceutical Technology, Pharmaceutical Chemistry, Clinical Pharmacy, Social and Administrative Pharmacy

string.name: Physics
string.br: Dean: Prof. Dr. Abdul Razak Ibrahim
Facilities are Energy Laboratory and Computer Lab

Research areas: Condensed Matter Physics and X-ray Crystallography, Applied and Engineering Physics, Energy Studies, Geophysics, Astronomy and Atmospheric Science, Theoretical and Computational Physics and Medical Physics and Radiation Science

string.name: Socialsciences
string.br: Dean: Professor Dr. Azlinda Binti Azman
Facilities are Computer Lab, Conference Room, Graduate Hall and Meeting Room
Focus on Anthropology and Sociology, Development Planning and Management, Economics, Political Science and Social Work

string.name: about
string.br: App developed and maintained by USM Students
Optimised for Android versions after 6.0 only ( Marshmallow )
Help us to improve by clicking feedback button below
